title.narrative: Twinning project ''Strengthening of the standards and metrology sector to the best practice in the EU MS
Degree of International Recognition of the national system for metrology

description.narrative: Degree of International Recognition of the national system for metrology

title.narrative: Degree of International Recognition of the national system for metrology

description.narrative: Reported results indicators by the European Commission ¿ International Cooperation and Development (DEVCO) may not represent the complete set of indicators monitored for the project. The results are reported using a contribution approach. This means that where a project has been financed by the EU jointly with other funders ¿ such as partner country governments or other donors ¿ the overall outputs of the collective effort are reported rather than outputs attributed to the share of funding provided by the EU. For higher levels of results, such as outcomes and impacts, the project will only have contributed to the overall effort.

target.value: International recognition of national system for metrology extended

comment.narrative: International recognition of national system for metrology extended

actual.value: International Recognition of the Metrology sector considerably enhanced

target.value: about 70 % of the technical personnel of the Moldovan National Institute for Metrology (INM) and CABs is trained on best practices
